name: Closure (itch)
description:
Synopsis:

The princess has been living alone with her dragon for 18 years and she's sick of that.

And one day, a knight came in to rescue her... or?

Description:

This game was made for the TyranoBuilder Summer Jam 2015, and the two people that worked for it are complete newbies to the engine.

We wanted something simple and fun, and this was the result.

Big thanks to the Steam Community for the Guides and Answers!

The Team:

Jayce Samantha Karim - In charge of the art and fiddling with the engine. College student studying Animation in Binus University Indonesia.

Amelia Veda - The person behind the story. College Student studying Game Design in Binus University Indonesia.

Stock Credits:

SE: http://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/
